<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Angradd (The Forge-Fire)](/Deities.aspx?ID=84)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 126 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Dwarven Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=6)

**Edicts** Seek and destroy evil, study evil to learn the best way to destroy it, train others in righteous ways

**Anathema** Allow weaker evils to survive due to the presence of larger evils, deceive others outside of tactical gain

**Follower Alignments**
LG, LN

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Constitution

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

**Favored Weapon** [Greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=21)

**Domains** [Fate](/Domains.aspx?ID=12), [Fire](/Domains.aspx?ID=13), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=27), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=37)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Burning Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=30)

- **2nd**
[Blistering Invective](/Spells.aspx?ID=674)

- **3rd**
[Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119)

</column>
name: Angradd (The Forge-Fire)
